name: anhydrite floor production | anhydrite floor | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4135/documentation

The raw materials for ready mix product are mixed. After mixing it is internally transported to the packing installation and packed. For the use 0.048 kg water has to be added per kg dry product (not included in this dataset). No direct process emissions are taken into account as they play a subordinate role compared to the emissions of the raw material production (e.g. drying of silica sand) and because no data is available. For inventorying the infrastructure, a yearly production amount of 150'000 tons is assumed. The lifespan of the machines is assumed to be 20 years.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Includes the whole manufacturing process to produce anhydrite floor (raw material provision, raw material mixing, packing, and storage), transports to plant, and infrastructure. No requirements for administration are included. No additional buildings and land-use are taken into account as it is assumed that the mixing process takes place in an existing building of the sand/cement industry or on the construction site
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2395:Manufacture of articles of concrete, cement and plaster

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: For the infrastructure RER- and for the silica sand DE-modules are used as proxy
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Assumed average current technology. The raw materials are mixed in an assumed average ratio, transported to the packing installation and packed.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography CH. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.

flow.name: anhydrite floor
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2395:Manufacture of articles of concrete, cement and plaster

exchanges.description:
The exchange has been updated from 'potassium chloride, as K2O' into 'potassium chloride' and therefore its amount has been scaled (multiplied) from 0.0015 kg by 1.5829 kg of 'potassium chloride' per kg of 'potassium chloride, as K2O'. Original comment of the exchange is: estimation
EcoSpold01Location=RER
